name: Portal2+D
description:
Hello and, again, welcome to the Aperture Science computer-aided enrichment center...in 2D world.

Game that impressed me on itch.io a lot is MiniDoom2. MiniDoom2 is 2D version favourite game-Doom and is beautiful. So i think: What about making something like this? What about make some logical game? Damm I like Portal game...

Here it is. You can meet GLaDOS in her pixelated beautifulnes, and official voice lines from Portal wiki(Big thanks). To bring into game right feel of Portal, I need good sounds, so Valve give me official sounds...just kidding on YouTube channel GameSoundEffect(Also big thanks) are all Portal sounds and many more.

This game take me more than 2 months, so i hope that you will see some progress. If you think of Cruasaders Cut...I think that is BIG progress.

Thank you for reading.
